hooks.command:
# Prevent editing on main branch
[ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "不能在 main 分支上编辑文件。请先创建功能分支。"}' >&2; exit 2; }

# Auto-format JS/Vue files
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|vue|jsx)$ ]]; then
  cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/frontend" 2>/dev/null && npx prettier --write "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH}" 2>&1
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "代码格式化失败。请检查文件语法错误。"}' >&2
    exit 1
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "已应用代码格式化。", "suppressOutput": true}'
  fi
fi

# Auto-format Python files
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.py$ ]]; then
  cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/backend" 2>/dev/null && npx black "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH}" 2>&1
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Python 代码格式化失败。请检查文件语法错误。"}' >&2
    exit 1
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "已应用 Python 代码格式化。", "suppressOutput": true}'
  fi
fi

# Auto-install dependencies when package.json changes
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ package\.json$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "正在安装前端依赖..."}' >&2
  cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/frontend" 2>/dev/null && npm install >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '{"feedback": "前端依赖已安装。", "suppressOutput": true}' || {
    echo '{"feedback": "安装前端依赖失败。"}' >&2
    exit 1
  }
fi

# Auto-install dependencies when requirements.txt changes
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ requirements\.txt$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "正在安装后端依赖..."}' >&2
  cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/backend" 2>/dev/null && pip install -r requirements.txt >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '{"feedback": "后端依赖已安装。", "suppressOutput": true}' || {
    echo '{"feedback": "安装后端依赖失败。"}' >&2
    exit 1
  }
fi

# Run Django migrations when models.py changes
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ models\.py$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "检测到模型变更，建议运行数据库迁移。"}' >&2
  echo '{"feedback": "运行: cd backend && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate"}'
fi
